postCreateCommand: composer create-project laravel/laravel /workspaces/${localWorkspaceFolderBasename}/tmp && mv -f /workspaces/${localWorkspaceFolderBasename}/tmp/{.,}* . && rm -rf /workspaces/${localWorkspaceFolderBasename}/tmp && mv -f /workspaces/${localWorkspaceFolderBasename}/devcontainer-postinstall.json /workspaces/${localWorkspaceFolderBasename}/.devcontainer/devcontainer.json
